interactive.title: the long read sign up page
interactive.css:
.email-signup__lozenge{margin:0px -4px}.is-hidden{display:none}.is-immersive{background-color:#951c55}.element-atom,.interactive-atom{margin:0 !important;overflow-x:hidden !important}.email-sub__form *{-webkit-box-sizing:border-box;-moz-box-sizing:border-box;box-sizing:border-box}.email-sub__form{font-size:0.875rem;line-height:1.25rem;font-family:"Guardian Text Sans Web","Helvetica Neue",Helvetica,Arial,"Lucida Grande",sans-serif}.gs-container{box-sizing:border-box;padding:0 8px}.gs-container.l-header__inner{padding:0}.content{padding-bottom:48px}.illustration-container{-webkit-transform:translate3d(0, 0, 0);transform:translate3d(0, 0, 0);background-color:#7c52be;min-height:10rem;height:220px;width:100%;position:relative;z-index:10}@media (min-width: 46.25em){.illustration-container{height:360px}}.inline-custom__png{overflow:hidden;background-image:url("https://media.guim.co.uk/7a461d62afa662af1b4a5bdc18ba60ba94055138/0_0_5257_840/5257.jpg");position:absolute;height:100%;width:100%;background-size:auto 100%;background-position:50% 0;background-repeat:no-repeat;margin:auto;z-index:5}.inline-svg{overflow:hidden;position:absolute;height:100%;width:auto;left:49%;transform:translateX(-50%);margin:auto;z-index:5}.inline-svg svg{height:220px}@media (min-width: 46.25em){.inline-svg svg{height:360px}}.email-signup{background-color:#951c55;min-width:16em}.main__column--horizontal-bar:before{content:'';display:block;border-bottom:2px solid #951c55}.email-signup-main{background-color:#951c55}.custom-email{margin-top:24px}.custom-email .email-sub__lozenge{border:0.0625rem solid #951c55;border-radius:100px;float:left;width:70%;height:3em;margin-bottom:12px}.custom-email .email-sub__lozenge:hover,.custom-email .email-sub__lozenge:focus,.custom-email .email-sub__lozenge:active{border-color:#fc7b90}@media (max-width: 46.24em){.custom-email .email-sub__lozenge{width:100%}}.custom-email .email-sub__lozenge--input{padding:.667em 1.250em}.custom-email .email-sub__lozenge--submit{color:#484848;width:25%;margin:0px 0px 12px 3%;background-color:inherit}@media (max-width: 46.24em){.custom-email .email-sub__lozenge--submit{width:100%;margin-left:0}}.custom-email .inline-clock{fill:#fff}.custom-email .email-signup__aside-text{font-size:13px;line-height:18px;font-family:"Guardian Text Sans Web","Helvetica Neue",Helvetica,Arial,"Lucida Grande",sans-serif;color:#fdadba;width:64%;margin:0% 4px}@media (max-width: 46.24em){.custom-email .email-signup__aside-text{width:97%}}.custom-email .email-signup__aside-text__frequency{color:#fff;float:right;font-weight:bold}.email-signup-header{color:#fff}.email-signup-header__heading{display:inline-block;padding-top:6px}.email-signup-header__heading svg{height:30px;width:159px}@media (min-width: 46.25em){.email-signup-header__heading svg{height:39px;width:206px}}.email-signup-header__intro{font-size:18px;line-height:24px;font-family:"Guardian Egyptian Web",Georgia,serif;font-weight:900;margin:0;line-height:0;padding-top:6px;padding-bottom:12px}@media (min-width: 46.25em){.email-signup-header__intro{font-size:20px;line-height:24px;font-family:"Guardian Egyptian Web",Georgia,serif;font-weight:900;line-height:0}}.email-signup-header__text{font-size:16px;line-height:24px;font-family:"Guardian Text Egyptian Web",Georgia,serif;margin-top:6px}@media (min-width: 46.25em){.email-signup-header__text{font-size:18px;line-height:28px;font-family:"Guardian Text Egyptian Web",Georgia,serif;margin-top:12px}}.email-signup-header a{display:inline-block;text-decoration:none !important;color:#fdadba}.email-signup-header a:hover{color:#fc7b90}.email-signup-header a::after{display:inline-block;position:relative;top:2px;content:'';background-image:url("data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20width%3D%2218%22%20height%3D%2218%22%20viewBox%3D%22-1%20-1%2020%2020%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%3E%3Cg%20fill%3D%22none%22%20fill-rule%3D%22evenodd%22%3E%3Ccircle%20stroke%3D%22%23fdadba%22%20stroke-width%3D%22.74%22%20cx%3D%229%22%20cy%3D%229%22%20r%3D%229%22%2F%3E%3Cpath%20fill%3D%22%23fdadba%22%20d%3D%22M9.43%203.27l5.1%205.37v.5l-5.1%205.38-.48-.5%203.66-4.6H3.3V8.37h9.34L9%203.77%22%2F%3E%3C%2Fg%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E");width:18px;height:18px;background-size:18px 18px;background-repeat:no-repeat}.email-signup-header a:hover::after{background-image:url("data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20width%3D%2218%22%20height%3D%2218%22%20viewBox%3D%22-1%20-1%2020%2020%22%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%3E%3Cg%20fill%3D%22none%22%20fill-rule%3D%22evenodd%22%3E%3Ccircle%20fill%3D%22%23fdadba%22%20stroke-width%3D%22.74%22%20cx%3D%229%22%20cy%3D%229%22%20r%3D%229%22%2F%3E%3Cpath%20fill%3D%22%23951c55%22%20d%3D%22M9.43%203.27l5.1%205.37v.5l-5.1%205.38-.48-.5%203.66-4.6H3.3V8.37h9.34L9%203.77%22%2F%3E%3C%2Fg%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E")}.android .email-signup-sample{height:300px}.android .inline-svg,.ios .inline-svg{display:none}.android .u-h,.ios .u-h{display:none}.android .inline-custom__png,.ios .inline-custom__png{display:block}
